QuestionArr.question:
Naming Rule 2:
A variable name can only contain alpha-numeric characters and underscores (A-z, 0-9, and _ )

a9a_ = 9
Is this variable declaration correct?
QuestionArr.correct_msg: Yes, it doesn’t start with a number, it has allowed special character _ , and alpha-numeric characters only.
QuestionArr.incorrect_msg: Yes, it doesn’t start with a number, it has allowed special character _ , and alpha-numeric characters only.
